DOC.brief_summary: This is a prospective pilot study to quantify the changes in heart rate when propofol is administered after inhalational anesthesia induction.
DOC.criteria: 1. At least 1 year of age or older. 2. Routine (elective) surgical patients with ASA classifications of 1 or 2 (healthy). 3. Patients that are already scheduled to receive inhalational induction followed by IV propofol. 1. Premature infants of less than 30 weeks, who are less that 60 weeks postgestational age at the time of study.
